name: Dredge the Quarry
description:
Made for DreadXP's Dredge the Depths Jam over the course of 10 days

The flooded quarry is a death hazard. After three drownings in 5 years, the county has decided to drain the quarry. But before they do that, you must claim the treasures the lie down below. But is there more to find than just treasure?...

CONTROLS

WASD for movement
Left Shift to deploy Rover
Space to continue text

Concept, Programming and Art by Scottie Supple

Music and Sound Design by Julian Crowhurst

Note from the developers:
Thanks for checking out our game! This was thrown together over the course of 10 days so please understand if its still rough around the edges. If you enjoyed and want to see it with more polish, let us know!

---WARNING---
Minimal testing was done within the time frame, beware of bugs and glitches
